items.title: These open-ear buds actually have decent noise reduction
items.summary: I was surprised that theseâ€¦ work pretty dang well. My biggest gripe about open-ear buds is that they're rotten for loud city commutes. Cue a pedantic audiophile pointing out that the whole premise of open-ear buds is to not block out sound. Yes, yes. But the unfortunate truth is that often means ifâ€¦

items.title: This desktop charger turns your iPhone into a robotic AI assistant
items.summary: The DeskMate doesnâ€™t have its own display, it just uses your iPhoneâ€™s. CES is packed with AI companions and assistant robots this year, but the DeskMate from Yoona is a clever take on the idea: it's a desktop charging hub, with three USB-C ports, one USB-A, and a MagSafe pad, that automatically actâ€¦

items.title: 'I hope he's here for a long time' â€“ Smith shows he's not done yet
items.summary: Steve Smith thwarts England again during the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney to leave only the great Sir Don Bradman ahead in terms of Ashes runs scored.

items.title: Here's when the vivo X200T is expected to launch and how much it will cost
items.summary: According to a new rumor, vivo will be launching the X200T in India in the last week of this month. The phone will have "aggressive pricing", starting around INR 50,000 to INR 55,000. That's lower than what a previous rumor claimed - INR 60,000. The vivo X200T will allegedly be offered in Stellar Bâ€¦

items.title: Smith & Head push England towards final Ashes loss
items.summary: Steve Smith's ruthless unbeaten century and Travis Headâ€™s majestic 163 on day three put Australia in total control of the fifth Ashes Test against England.

items.title: 'He's like a gladiator' - Smith reaches century as Australia build lead
items.summary: Australia captain Steve Smith leads from the front as he scores his 13th career Ashes century on his home ground to help his team to 449-7 in their first innings, giving them a 65-run lead against England on day three of the fifth Test in Sydney.

items.title: Asia-Pacific Video Revenue to Reach $196 Billion by 2030, With India Overtaking China in SVOD Subscriptions, Report Forecasts
items.summary: Streaming services, social video platforms and connected TV are poised to dominate Asia-Pacific screen revenue growth through the end of the decade, even as traditional television continues its structural decline, according to Media Partners Asiaâ€™s newly released Asia-Pacific Video & Broadband 2026â€¦

items.title: Realme 16 Pro+ is here with 200MP main cam and 7,000 mAh battery
items.summary: Realme 16 Pro+ is the first major release from the brand in 2026, and it brings an updated design with a clear focus on cameras. It's among the first Realme devices to sport the new LumaColor Image image processing technology, which aims to deliver more natural skin tones, improved color accuracy aâ€¦

items.title: From Aronimink to Zalatoris - an A-Z of golf in 2026
items.summary: It could be a struggle to match the tumultuous highs of last year but there is still plenty to look forward to in the coming 12 months, writes Iain Carter.

items.title: Nvidia introduces DLSS 4.5 and Multi Frame Generation 6X at CES 2026 â€” updated models can generate higher-quality upscaled frames and more of them, dynamically
items.summary: Nvidia might not be introducing new gaming GPUs at CES 2026, but version 4.5 of its DLSS upscaler and an upcoming MFG 6x mode promises better image quality and smoother performance.

items.title: RedMagic 11 Air seemingly runs Geekbench confirming its chipset and RAM amount
items.summary: Last month RedMagic confirmed that it's working on the 11 Air, the successor to the RedMagic 10 Air launched back in April. The RedMagic 11 Air uses the Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, as confirmed by a Geekbench run of a device with the model number NX799J. This is most likely the RedMagic 11 Air. The proâ€¦

items.title: Nvidiaâ€™s new G-Sync monitors automatically adjust brightness just like a laptop
items.summary: Nvidia is bringing a new set of G-Sync Pulsar monitors to the market this week that will automatically adjust brightness and color based on the ambient lighting in a room. Much like a modern laptop, these new monitors have a built-in light sensor that measures the brightness and color temperature oâ€¦

items.title: Nvidia announces DLSS 4.5 with 6x Frame Generation and improved image quality
items.summary: Nvidia is announcing its next major update to its Deep Learning Super Sampling (DLSS) feature at CES today. DLSS 4.5 includes Nvidia's second-generation Super Resolution transformer model and a new 6x Multi Frame Generation mode for RTX 50-series GPUs that uses AI to generate up to five additional â€¦

items.title: Emersonâ€™s SmartVoice devices follow verbal instructions without Wi-Fi or a hub
items.summary: The SmartVoice Air Fryer responds to over 1,000 voice commands. | Image: IAI Smart A new line of small appliances and devices from IAI Smart, billed as Emerson Smart products, are now available that will let you operate fans, heaters, smart plugs, and air fryers with your voice - with no apps, Wi-Fâ€¦

items.title: Yashâ€™s â€˜Toxicâ€™ Unveils First Look of Rukmini Vasanth as Mellisa (EXCLUSIVE)
items.summary: The team behind Yashâ€™s â€œToxic â€“ A Fairytale for Grown-Upsâ€ has revealed Rukmini Vasanth as Mellisa, continuing the character-driven rollout that has positioned the production as one of 2026â€™s most anticipated releases. Following character unveilings for Kiara Advani as Nadia, Huma Qureshi as Elizabâ€¦

items.title: Are in-form Wrexham really dreaming of a fourth promotion?
items.summary: Wrexham are a point off the Championship play-off spots, raising the prospect of another promotion - this time to the Premier League.

items.title: AMD touts Instinct MI430X, MI440X, and MI455X AI accelerators and Helios rack-scale AI architecture at CES â€” full MI400-series family fulfills a broad range of infrastructure and customer requirements
items.summary: AMD reveals additional details about its strategy for AI and HPC deployments this year with EPYC 'Venice' and 'Venice-X' CPUs as well as Instinct MI430X, MI440X, and MI455X accelerators.

items.title: Qualcomm announces Snapdragon X2 Plus for cheaper laptops
items.summary: Back in September, Qualcomm unveiled the Snapdragon X2 Elite and Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme chipsets for Windows on Arm laptops, and today it's introducing the cheaper option in the portfolio, the Snapdragon X2 Plus. This is the successor to the Snapdragon X Plus from September 2024. The Snapdragoâ€¦

items.title: Kristen Stewart Says She â€˜Would Loveâ€™ to Direct a â€˜Twilightâ€™ Reboot: â€˜Iâ€™m Doing It!â€™
items.summary: Kristen Stewart recently told â€œEntertainment Tonightâ€ that she â€œwould loveâ€ to direct a reboot of â€œTwilight,â€ the 2008 vampire romantasy film that launched her career. â€œI would love â€” look. I love what Catherine [Hardwicke] did, I love what Chris [Weitz] did, I love what all of the directors did wiâ€¦

items.title: Alienware brings OLED to its gaming laptops for the first time in years â€” anti-glare OLED display boasts 240Hz refresh rate and 0.2ms response time
items.summary: Alienware is bringing its 16-inch laptops up to speed with other high-end offerings, introducing a 240Hz OLED panel for the first time ever across its Area-51 and Aurora designs.

items.title: AMDâ€™s Ryzen 7 9850X3D promises 7% uplift over Ryzen 7 9800X3D â€“ AMD fights itself with â€˜new fastest gaming processorâ€™
items.summary: The long-rumored Ryzen 7 9850X3D is official, but AMDâ€™s own benchmarks paint an underwhelming picture for performance gains.

items.title: AMD's Ryzen AI 400 series includes the first Copilot+ desktop CPU â€” Team Red refreshes Zen 5 APUs and Strix Halo
items.summary: AMDâ€™s new Ryzen AI 400 â€˜Gorgon Pointâ€™ APUs are primarily driven by a clock speed bump, featuring similar silicon as the previous generation otherwise.

items.title: Alienware is working on new slim and cheaper gaming laptops
items.summary: These renders of the ultra-slim (left) and entry-level (right) models are our only glimpse of Alienwareâ€™s unnamed laptops. Dell-owned Alienware is looking to reach a wider swath of gamers, announcing at CES 2026 that it's working on two new laptops: one with a lower, entry-level price and one with â€¦

items.title: HP crammed an entire desktop computer into this keyboard
items.summary: Thereâ€™s a whole computer in there. This kind of rules? HP is announcing a new mini desktop computer at CES 2026, and the whole thing is housed in a compact keyboard. The Eliteboard G1a looks like a normal office keyboard with either a captive or detachable USB-C cable, but inside it is an AMD Ryzenâ€¦

items.title: AMDâ€™s new Ryzen 7 9850X3D makes the best gaming CPU even faster
items.summary: AMD is introducing an improved version of its popular Ryzen 7 9800X3D processor today at CES. The new Ryzen 7 9850X3D offers up the same 8-core / 16-thread CPU as the 9800X3D, running at even faster boost clocks. "We've fine-tuned our best gaming processor in the world and have increased the boost â€¦

items.title: AMD Ryzen AI 400 official: Will these laptop chips maintain AMDâ€™s lead?
items.summary: We were rightly skeptical of AMD's Ryzen AI 300 "Strix Point" laptop chips in 2024. Now they're in some of the very best laptops you can buy, arguably hitting the sweet spot of price, performance, and battery life. Today at CES, AMD is announcing its successor, the Ryzen AI 400 line - but there's nâ€¦

items.title: Boundaries, drops and no more reviews - England's morning to forget
items.summary: Expensive overs, dropped catches and lost reviews sees England have a morning session to forget against Australia on day three of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: Keychron launches wireless Q Ultra keyboard series with up to 660 hours of battery life with 8K polling â€” thanks to ZMK firmware
items.summary: Keychron launches new Q Ultra keyboard series with up to 660 hours of battery life with an 8K wireless polling rate, thanks to open source ZMK firmware. Also announces high-end luxury keyboards made of rock.

items.title: Head finally out for 163 as Bethell gets first Ashes wicket
items.summary: England finally bring an end to Travis Head's innings as he's trapped lbw for 163 by Jacob Bethell as he picks up his first Ashes wicket, to leave Australia 288-4 in their first innings, trailing England by 96 runs on day three of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: 'He's way ahead of the rest' - Head hits another stunning Ashes innings
items.summary: Watch the best shots of Travis Head's first innings as the Australian batter hits 163 off 166 balls, his third score of 100 or higher in the series, to put his side in control of the fifth and final Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: New Documentary â€˜Disneyland Handcrafterâ€™ To Premiere on Disney+ (TV News Roundup)
items.summary: Disney fans behold: â€œDisneyland Handcrafted,â€ a new feature documentary from producer and director Leslie Iwerks, will premiere â€” and be available to stream â€” on Disney+ and Disney YouTube on Jan. 22. Built from rare archival footage and original audio recordings, the film will give viewers an insiâ€¦

items.title: Gemini on Google TV is getting smarter
items.summary: Today at CES, Google has announced a few improvements coming to Gemini for Google TV. These features will arrive on "select TCL devices" first, and other Google TV devices "over the coming months". First, you'll be able to use Gemini to search through your Google Photos library for specific people â€¦

items.title: 'What a miss!' - Jacks' moment to forget as Head survives
items.summary: Will Jacks drops a simple catch on the boundary as England miss the chance to remove Travis Head, who remains unbeaten on 121 on day three of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: Con Pederson, â€˜2001: A Space Odysseyâ€™ Special Effects Supervisor, Dies at 91
items.summary: Con Pederson, one of four special effects supervisors on â€œ2001: A Space Odyssey,â€ died Friday at the MPTF residence in Woodland Hills following complications from Alzheimerâ€™s. He was 91. Pederson was a fixture in the field of science fiction filmmaking, particularly thanks to his involvement on Staâ€¦

items.title: Tony Dokoupilâ€™s â€˜CBS Evening Newsâ€™ Debut Is an Inauspicious Sign of Where CBS News Is Headed
items.summary: Tony Dokoupilâ€™s debut as the anchor of the â€œCBS Evening Newsâ€ came widely heralded â€” by Tony Dokoupil. The broadcast journalist, who since 2019 had been CBSâ€™ morning show co-anchor, came into the seat once held by Walter Cronkite, Dan Rather and Katie Couric with plenty of attitude, saying in a recâ€¦

items.title: Amazon's Alexa+ now has a home on the web
items.summary: Amazon's AI-powered Alexa+ chatbot now has its very own home on the web at alexa.com. You just need to sign in with your Amazon account to use it, provided you are part of the Alexa+ Early Access. Amazon says over 10 million people are already using Alexa+, the AI-infused evolution of the Alexa assâ€¦

items.title: Asus ROG G1000 gaming PC is covered in holograms â€” this RTX 5090, 9950X3D rig is 'built to be seen'
items.summary: There are also new gaming laptops.

items.summary: HP is ringing in the new year at CES 2026 with the HyperX Omen 34 gaming monitor, which boasts next-generation V-Stripe QD-OLED technology and a wealth of gaming features

items.title: Rashford may have route back to Man Utd - Tuesday's gossip
items.summary: Ruben Amorim sacking might offer Marcus Rashford way back to Manchester United, trio may stay at Old Trafford after head coach's exit, Juventus keen on Federico Chiesa return.

items.title: Acer refreshes Swift laptops with Panther Lake â€” claims 'world's largest haptic touchpad' on Swift 16 AI
items.summary: Acer is refreshing its Swift, Swift Edge, and Swift Go laptops at CES 2026 with the latest Intel processors, but we still don't know how much they'll cost.

items.title: HP puts HyperX name on Omen gaming laptops â€” new systems get Intel and AMD's latest processors
items.summary: HP has put HyperX front and center as its gaming system brand, combining it with Omen as it updates systems to Panther Lake and Gorgon Point.

items.title: MSIâ€™s Prestige ultra-thin laptops and convertibles embrace Panther Lake â€“ up to Core Ultra X9 with standard OLED panels
items.summary: MSI includes Intel Panther Lake processors across the board (up to a Core Ultra X9) with its new Prestige family.

items.title: Dell brings back XPS laptops â€” ditches the capacitive touch bar, adds 1Hz display option, and upgrades 14 and 16-inch models
items.summary: Dell is bringing back the XPS laptop brand, and has redesigned the system to remove the controversial capacitive function row. This year's XPS 14 and 16 are getting Intel's Panther Lake processors, and a new 13-incher is coming later this year.

items.title: Intel doubles down on gaming with Panther Lake, claims 76% faster gaming performance â€” new X-series chips can match discrete RTX 4050
items.summary: Intel finally unveiled the specs and speeds of its Panther Lake processors at CES, with the headline addition being a new lineup of X-series chips that sport a bigger GPU.

items.title: Nvidia launches Vera Rubin NVL72 AI supercomputer at CES â€” promises up to 5x greater inference performance and 10x lower cost per token than Blackwell, coming 2H 2026
items.summary: During his CES 2026 keynote, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang introduced Vera Rubin NVL72, the companyâ€™s next-generation rack-scale AI accelerator. Rubin promises 5x greater inference performance and 10x lower cost per token than the last-gen Grace Blackwell NVL72 rack.

items.title: Motorola Razr Fold leaks in official-looking images in two colors
items.summary: Mere hours ago we got word that Motorola is working on its first book-style foldable to be called Razr Fold, and now some official-looking press renders showing it have been leaked by Evan Blass, the legend also known as @evleaks. Motorola Razr Fold leaked images As you can see from the images abovâ€¦

items.title: Samsung's new 'Odyssey 3D' 6K monitor takes center stage at CES 2026, features solid eye-tracking â€” 1,000 Hz dual-mode panel also on display, alongside new G6 & G8 OLED monitors
items.summary: Samsung brought out the big guns at CES 2026, showing off six monitors, all aimed at different use cases. We walked away impressed with the "Odyssey 3D" and how convincing it was, but the company also had two new OLED displays, and even a 1,000 Hz-capable panel, alongside a 6K offering with dual-moâ€¦

items.title: Stop experiments and get manager who fits Man Utd DNA - Neville
items.summary: Gary Neville urges Manchester United to 'stop experimenting' and appoint a manager who fits the club's DNA after Ruben Amorim was sacked on Monday.

items.title: MediaTek is unveiling two new chipsets on January 15, Dimensity 8500 is one of them
items.summary: MediaTek is holding a launch event in China on January 15, and is expected to unveil two new chipsets on that occasion. Rumor has it will we finally see the much-anticipated Dimensity 8500 at this event, the successor to the 8450 and 8400, both highly regarded upper-midrange chipsets. The Honor Powâ€¦

items.title: Newegg bundles $1,460 128GB DDR5 memory kit with $50 Starbucks gift card â€” 'Drink Coffee while you game!!' retailer says as memory hits RTX 5080 pricing

items.title: For the first time in 5 years, Nvidia will not announce any new GPUs at CES â€” company quashes RTX 50 Super rumors as AI expected to take center stage
items.summary: Nvidia has just announced on X that its CES 2026 keynote will not include "any new GPUs," breaking a five-year long streak of unveiling new hardware at every Las Vegas show. Instead, the company will focus on AI developments.

items.title: OWC reveals 192TB of blazing 6.6 GB/s storage inside desktop data powerhouse â€” twelve 16TB M.2 SSDs deliver potent speed through Thunderbolt 5
items.summary: OWC unveils a game-changing capacity boost for its ThunderBlade X12 RAID storage solutionâ€” now offering an astonishing 192TB of storage, doubling its previous maximum.
